title: Bug 49503 - Connectors Delayed Port Binding in Catalina.load()
description: This bug report highlights a problem where Connectors in Tomcat fail to bind to their ports during the Catalina.load() phase and only succeed later during the start() phase.
OB: The observed behavior is not explicitly described in the report.
EB: The expected behavior is not explicitly mentioned in the report.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add the following line to 'conf/catalina.properties': 'org.apache.catalina.startup.EXITONINITFAILURE=true'
2. Start two Tomcat instances with the same configuration simultaneously.
